description: Main entry point and core UI components of a Flutter application for the 'Pluto' app, including environment setup, theming, navigation, and placeholder screens.

classes.name: PlutoApp
classes.description: Root widget of the app, setting up theming and initial state based on user premium status.

classes.name: PlutoHome
classes.description: Main screen with bottom navigation and app bar, with a premium indicator.

classes.name: _PlutoHomeState
classes.description: State management for PlutoHome, handling navigation and UI updates.

classes.name: _TabPlaceholder
classes.description: Placeholder widget for different tabs/screens in the app.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Asynchronous entry point, initializes environment and preferences, then runs the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for PlutoApp and PlutoHome, including theming and navigation.
